name: To The Roots (TEXADev, bluerune)
description:
You're a decay inside a mouth with the objective of infect all the teeth, by pressing e while on it's side you'll be able to destroy them until you reach the root of every single teeth.

move through the mouth evading the enemies that want to stop you, shoot parts of yourself to distract them.

Attach to the teeths to expose the root, pick food that lies around the mouth to throw it to destroy the roots.

- Programming -

Gonzalo Martínez

Inti Fernández

Kaiel Maglione

- Music and sound design -

Claudio Vignone

- Art and design -

Matias Faviere

Bruna Sosa
